Keywords: Asgardian , Avengers , Cosmic , Deity , Warrior
Real Name: Thor Odinson
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Destroy Blocking
TARGETING: Characters
NO ASGARDIAN SHALL FALL: Defend. // When a friendly character that's adjacent or has the Asgardian keyword would take 4 or more damage, they take 3 instead.
LIGHTNING STORM: Giant Reach: 3. Quake, but deals 3 penetrating damage instead of 2 damage.
THE BATTLE SHALL BE OURS: Leadership. When Thor uses it, he may treat friendly characters with the Asgardian keyword within range as adjacent.

Brundun94
Idk that there's an issue with his powerset at these values. Maybe 1 less click of life, but the game is being tailored to 300 pt Modern competitive players; wk has made that very clear. To that end, 175 is a huge point sink in that format, and he is 1 outwit away from almost certain death by turn 4 at the latest, unless your dice are utterly dead against him. That said, a very fun casual piece.
